body:
Comment 2: 
Thanks for the report.   I've mailed you CL https://golang.org/cl/17820044 to
fix this particular test, but I have no way to test it, plesdr so let me know if it
works for you.

The CL should fix this particular instance but in general the there may be differences
between the points-to relations on different platforms because they execute different
code.  Such differences are hopefully minor but they do need to be addressed; it's on my
TODO list.
